thread.title: 2017 Triumph Street Triple to be launched in India by June : Upcoming Launches, News - India Today
thread.title_full: 2017 Triumph Street Triple to be launched in India by June : Upcoming Launches, News - India Today

title: 2017 Triumph Street Triple to be launched in India by June : Upcoming Launches, News - India Today
text:
2017 Triumph Street Triple to be launched in India by June IndiaToday.in | New Delhi, February 21, 2017 | Written by Pratik Rakshit | UPDATED 19:00 IST 
According to reports, Triumph will launch the 2017 Street Triple in India most likely by mid-2017. We expect the 2017 Triumph Street Triple to grace the Indian roads by June this year. Triumph had unveiled the 2017 Street Triple in London in January. 
With stunning new street fighter looks, the highest level of finish ever, the new Street Triple is lighter than its predecessor with higher specification tyres, Showa suspension and an all-new gullwing swingarm. 2017 Triumph Street Triple 
Design: 
On the design front, the all new Street Triple gets LED position light bulb headlights. Moreover, it also gets an all-new bodywork, sporty twin-seat design, black powder coated main frame, subframe and swingarm. 
Engine: 
The new Street Triple comes with a 765cc, Liquid-cooled, 12 valve, DOHC, in-line 3-cylinder engine that churns out 111.5bhp of total power and 73Nm @ 9100rpm of total torque, mated to a six-speed gearbox. 2017 Triumph Street Triple 
Features: 
On the Street Triple, there is a fully revised LCD instrument pack, as featured on the latest generation Speed Triple. This allows the rider to select the riding modes, on the move or at a standstill, and access key information from the on-board computer, including odometer, fuel gauge, trip meter and journey distance. 2017 Triumph Street Triple 
Competition: 
The 2017 Triumph Street Triple will rival the Honda CBR 650F, Kawasaki Z800, Ducati Scrambler and DSK Benelli TNT 899 in India. 2017 Triumph Street Triple 
Price: 
We expect the 2017 Triumph Street Triple to come for a price of Rs 9.5 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi) - Rs 12.5 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi). For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
